# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
DynamicParam {
$A = New-Object System.Management.Automation.ParameterAttribute
$a.Mandatory = $true
}
```

# Expected behavior

```none

```

# Actual behavior

```none
False
```

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none
PSVersion                      7.1.0-daily.20200410                   PSEdition                      Core                                   GitCommitId                    7.1.0-daily.20200410                   OS                             Linux 4.9.112-perf #1 SMP PREEMPT Mon… Platform                       Unix
```
title: DynamicParam  Mandatory = $true invalid
